name: Smart Baby! Animals: ABC Learning Kids Games, Apps
name_original: Smart Baby! Animals: ABC Learning Kids Games, Apps
description:
Fun Educational Games for Early Development of Children from 2 years.
Professional English Voice! Amazing Animals! Alphabet, Numbers & Words! Animal Sounds and much more!

The app includes several learning games with different animals and helps your baby to learn numbers, new words, alphabet and much more.
Compare and play with animals with one touch!

The games are built on the principle "from the simple to the complex" and will keep your child occupied from the very first minutes.
Each baby will be able to play regardless of his or her age.

The app includes such learning games and activities as:
- Learning Words
- Memory game
- Find the animal
- Puzzles
- Counting
- Shadows of animals

The app allows your baby to develop logic, as well as attention, memory, fine motor skills and discipline successfully and independently.
